languages.text: "Боюсь, я не могу посоветовать вам многого. Поговорите с представителями других домов, послушайте, о чем шепчется их свита... Возможно, вы услышите нечто необычное".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, я не могу посоветовать вам многого. Поговорите с представителями других домов, послушайте, о чем шепчется их свита... Возможно, вы услышите то, что вам слышать не стоит. К сожалению, сейчас как ваш канцлер я совершенно бесполезна. Простите, Ваша Светлость..."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, я не могу посоветовать вам многого. Поговорите с представителями других домов, послушайте, о чем шепчется их свита... Возможно, вы услышите нечто необычное".

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid I cannot recommend a lot to you. Talk with the representatives of the other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... Perhaps you will be able to hear something unusual."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid I cannot recommend a lot to you. Talk with the representatives of the other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... Perhaps you will be able to hear something unusual."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid I cannot recommend a lot to you. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will be able to hear something unusual."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid I cannot recommend a lot to you. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will be able to hear something unusual."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「申し訳ありませんが、あまりお役に立てません。他家の代表と話をし、その随行者たちの会話を耳に入れてはいかがでしょう…そうすれば、何か異常を感じ取れるかと思います」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありませんが、あまりお役に立てません。他家の代表と話をし、その随行者たちの会話を耳に入れてはいかがでしょう…そうすれば、何か異常を感じ取れるかと思います」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “恐怕我也帮不上什么忙。或许您可以与其他家族的人聊一聊，听听他们的随从在说什么……或许可以得到不同寻常的消息。”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我也没有太多建议。或许您可以与其他家族的人聊一聊，听听他们的随从在说什么……或许可以得到不同寻常的消息。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Je crains de ne pas vous être d'une grande aide. Parlez aux représentants des autres maisons, écoutez discrètement ce que se dit dans leur entourage... Avec un peu de chance, vous entendrez quelque chose d'intéressant. »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains de ne pas vous être d'une grande aide. Parlez aux représentants des autres maisons, écoutez discrètement ce que se dit dans leur entourage... Avec un peu de chance, vous entendrez quelque chose d'intéressant. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Me temo que no puedo ser de gran ayuda. Hable con los representantes de otras casas, escuche a escondidas a su séquito... Quizá se sorprenda».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no puedo decirle mucho. Hable con los representantes de otras casas, escuche a escondidas a su séquito... Quizá se sorprenda».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, ich kann Euch nicht groß helfen. Sprecht mit den Vertretern anderer Häuser, belauscht ihr Gefolge ... vielleicht schnappt Ihr etwas Ungewöhnliches auf."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, ich kann Euch keine erhellenden Ratschläge geben. Sprecht mit den Vertretern anderer Häuser, belauscht ihr Gefolge ... vielleicht schnappt Ihr etwas Ungewöhnliches auf."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Korkarım pek yardımcı olamayacağım. Diğer hanelerin temsilcileriyle konuşun, maiyetlerinin sohbetlerine kulak kabartın... Belki sıra dışı bir şey duyarsınız."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot be of much help. Talk to the representatives of other houses, eavesdrop on their retinue... and perhaps you will hear something unusual."

traits.locale_text: "Korkarım pek yardımcı olamayacağım. Diğer hanelerin temsilcileriyle konuşun, maiyetlerinin sohbetlerine kulak kabartın... Belki sıra dışı bir şey duyarsınız."
traits.speaker: Clemence
